content:
Hi!
Is ist possible to give a Member permission to a Stream without subscribing by default?
thx, fabian

we have a lot of private streams, where I would grant access to some people who a might interested in.
but I guess it is not possible by now.
@Fabian correct, currently only users subscribed to a private stream have access to it.

Hi all!
Could you please explain how to create cron jobs in Zulip docker container?
